feed.title: Upcoming network event: block v2 lock-in

entry.title: Upcoming network event: block v2 lock-in
entry.summary: In a conversation between Luke-Jr and Jeff Garzik on March 23, 2013, Luke-Jr expressed his belief that nobody was mining using bitcoind 0.7 or later. However, Jeff Garzik pointed out that several major mining pools, including slush, BTC Guild, and ozcoin, were in fact using these versions of the software.
